metadata.synopsis: AD for Incubus in female form when they need to call imps to combat.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. teleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_Incubus3. Talk until Haarlep is transformed into succubus but before imps are called4. Attack

0.speaker: Haarlep
0.text: Come, impies! This one won't play nice!
